Sam Heughan fans have been left divided over his role in Channel 4's new mystery drama Suspect, also starring James Nesbitt and Anne Marie Duff.

articles.title: Presenter Yinka Bokinni reveals the scary hits people have put out on others who've angered them - Daily Mail
articles.description: Presenter Yinka Bokinni has opened up about tracking down hitmen on the Dark Web ahead of her new Channel 4 docu-series How To Hire a Hitman, which airs tonight at 10pm.
